name: GEODODGE - Big vs. Small
description:
Note: You need to play mandatory in full screen mode

Note2: This game only has one final boss. Enjoy the battle.

Controls

W-Move Forward

A-Move left

S-Move Back

D-Move Right

Esc-PAUSE Menu

We had to design a dash because without this the game can’t be completed.

Space Bar-Dash --> It has reload time

You can be hit five times, if you get hit five times you will die and you will have to start again.

History:

The SPACE is infected by the darkness and you are the only one who isn’t infested, you will have to destroy the darkness defeating the enemies who are affected by this. Once you have done this the peace will be restored to the world and it will be the end of a gloomy world 

Reviews are apreciated. Thanks
